Name: Who Shuffled My Shapes?
About the game: Your shapes have been shuffled and it’s up to you to fix them! Get your puzzles back in order by twisting, turning, and spinning until all faces are flat and the same colour. Sounds simple but it’s not. With some of the simpler puzzles offering over 43 quintillion possible configurations (that’s 43,000,000,000,000,000,000), finding the single correct one will be a challenge! Shuffle the cube again once you're done and try a new combination you need to crack! Take your time and relax, or put yourself up against the clock to see how fast you can be! A staggering 20 different puzzles for you to play with. With puzzle shapes ranging from classic cubes to pyramids, dodecahedrons, and even off-axis shapes; there is something exciting for uninitiated and expert puzzlers alike!
